definition[0]: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel
definition[1]: if something radiates light or heat, or if light or heat radiates from something, the light or heat is sent out in all directions
example[2]: The log fire radiated a warm cosy glow.
example[3]: Heat radiated from the glowing coals.
definition[2]: if things radiate from a central point, they spread out in different directions from that point
example[4]: There were tiny lines radiating from the corners of her eyes.
